alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 2:42PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A thunderstorm with gusty winds will impact portions of northwestern Lincoln County through 345 PM CDT... At 241 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm with gusty winds 7 miles north of Sutherland, or 21 miles northwest of North Platte, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... North Platte, Sutherland, Hershey, North Platte Airport, Coker, O`Fallons and Birdwood. This includes the following highways... Highway 97 between mile markers 1 and 12. Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 164 and 187. Highway 83 between mile markers 79 and 98. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
